alert.note: Alert for Clay (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 04 at 4:23PM CDT until October 04 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...SOUTHWESTERN STEPHENS...SOUTHEASTERN COTTON AND NORTH CENTRAL CLAY COUNTIES... At 423 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hastings, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Waurika, Temple, Ryan, Byers, Hastings, Addington, Sugden, Waurika Lake, Taylor, and Charlie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
